headline: Keysight’s New Sampling Oscilloscopes Revolutionize 1.6T Transceiver Optical Testing for AI Data Centers
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., March 25, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) has announced two new oscilloscopes for 1.6T optical transceiver testing: a single optical channel DCA-M and dual optical channel DCA-M Sampling Oscilloscopes. Designed to deliver the highest optical measurement sensitivity and integrated clock recovery up to 120 GBaud, the instruments specifically target the rigorous demands of 1.6T transceiver optical testing for R&D and manufacturing of next-generation optical interc
